references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to the use of large language models and autoregressive approaches to graph generation.

references.paper_title: GraphRNN: Generating realistic graphs with deep autoregressive models
references.reason: This is a foundational paper in the field of graph generation that introduced the autoregressive approach for modeling graph structure.

references.paper_title: Learning deep generative models of graphs
references.reason: This study is crucial due to its introduction of deep generative models for graphs.

references.paper_title: DiGress: Discrete denoising diffusion for graph generation
references.reason: This paper is important due to its introduction of discrete diffusion models for graph generation, which is directly related to the proposed model in this paper.
This is a seminal work in reinforcement learning that is directly used for the fine-tuning strategy employed in this study.
